firstPage.headline: Get on the talent
firstPage.copy:
You think you might be a good fit for SinnerSchrader?
Just drop us a link to one of your profiles - if it's a match, we'll reach out to you.

secondPage.profileExample: e.g. github, gitlab, linkedIn, Xing, portfolio
secondPage.copy: We're keeping your personal details secure and don't share it with 3rd parties of course. Find out more in our
